sentences.sContent: He or she will then show you how all these things, combined, play a role in choosing a career.
sentences.sCn: 然后他/她会向你解释如何将这些事情结合起来，在你择业时发挥作用。

sentences.sContent: I think this may be an extraordinary moment in history where Africa can become a continent of hope and the Bank can play a role in that.
sentences.sCn: 他说："我认为，这可能是历史上一个不同寻常的时刻，使非洲成为一个希望的大陆，世行可以在这方面发挥作用。

synos.tran: 发挥作用；扮演一个角色
